trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a designer host for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for utforming i designer vert for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: I en designer vert når brukeren bytter fra kilden til utformingsvisning, kildekode markup som beskriver en kontroll som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>abstrakt klasse som er analysert og en utformingen versjon av kontrollen er opprettet på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren bytter tilbake til visning i datakilden, er utformingen kontrollen beholdt i markup kildekode og redigeres i markup for websiden.

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner class provides design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: Klassen HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner gir støtte for utforming for kolonner som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>i designer vert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner klasseegenskapene inneholder følgende funksjonalitet: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>returnerer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objektet, som vanligvis inneholder et objekt som er avledet av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>klasse for hvert nivå i treet arving av designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>Egenskapen gir tilgang til utformeren av datakilden, hvis en er definert.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A>Egenskapen henter standardvisningen for datakilden som er bundet til den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> property determines whether the control should render its default action lists for choosing and creating data sources.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A>Egenskapen bestemmer om kontrollen skal gjengi standard handlingen listen for å velge og opprette datakilder.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> method performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Metodene HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner klassen inneholder følgende funksjonalitet: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A>metoden utfører handlingene som er nødvendig for å koble til den gjeldende datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> method creates a new data source for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A>Metoden oppretter en ny datakilde for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>Metoden binding den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen til en datakilde for utforming.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A> method performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A>Metoden utfører handlingene som er nødvendig for å koble fra den gjeldende datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>Metoden henter en datakilde som kan brukes på utformingstidspunktet for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A> method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A>Metoden bygger en datakilde i eksemplet som kan brukes på utformingstidspunktet for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove properties from or add additional properties to or to shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>Metoden brukes til å fjerne egenskaper fra eller legge til flere egenskaper til eller skyggen egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt bygger en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>klasse når du oppretter den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klasse eller en kopi av kontrollen på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter designer handlingen liste-samlingen for utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ActionLists oppretter et tomt <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objektet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> tilknyttet utformeren.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Utfører handlingene som er nødvendig for å koble til den gjeldende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectToDataSource method disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events from the previous data source, and then attaches these events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ConnectToDataSource kobler fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>hendelser fra forrige datakilden, og deretter kobles disse hendelsene til den nye datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a connection to a new data source was performed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the old and new data source are the same.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det ble utført en tilkobling til en ny datakilde; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis gammel og ny datakilden er like.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new data source for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny datakilde for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSource method displays a dialog box that can be used to create a data source for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDataSource vises en dialogboks som kan brukes til å opprette en datakilde for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Tilknyttede kontrollen bindes til datakilden utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method first sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control to reference the design-time data source and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Databinde metoden første angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>tilgangskontroll til som referanse utformingen datakilde og angir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataBind calls back to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Databinde ringe tilbake til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>metode for kontrollen som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klasse skal bindes til datakilden utformingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, it restores the original values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt den gjenoppretter de opprinnelige verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: Den `dataBoundControl` parameteren er kontrollen som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klasse som er knyttet til utformeren eller en kopi av denne kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> skal bindes til datakilden utformingen.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Gir tilgang til utformeren av datakilden, når en er valgt for databinding.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the designer or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Kan få tilgang til datakilden ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>for utformeren eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>, which implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Designer for datakilden for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref>, som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardvisningen for datakilden som er bundet til den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the designer or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Kan få tilgang til datakilden ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>for utformeren eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> som representerer standardvisningen av datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Utfører handlingene som er nødvendig for å koble fra den gjeldende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The DisconnectFromDataSource method disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DisconnectFromDataSource kobler fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>hendelser fra den gjeldende datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en datakilde som kan brukes på utformingstidspunktet for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, it is better to use a simple predefined data source at design time rather than the actual data source for the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Av hensyn til ytelsen er det best å bruke en enkel forhåndsdefinerte-datakilde ved utformingen i stedet for faktiske datakilden for kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> grensesnitt som kan brukes som en datakilde for kontroller avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Bygger en datakilde i eksemplet som kan brukes på utformingstidspunktet for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The sample data constructed by the GetSampleDataSource method has a single node with an empty path.
trans-unit.target: Eksempeldataene konstruert av metoden GetSampleDataSource har én enkelt node med en tom bane.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> grensesnitt som kan brukes som en datakilde for kontroller avledet fra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Brukes av designer Fjern egenskaper fra eller legge til flere egenskaper i visningen i den **Egenskaper** rutenett eller skyggen egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen utviklere bruker metodene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden skyggelegge ulike egenskaper for kontroll med tilsvarende utformingen egenskaper som designer implementerer, og du kan legge til egenskaper til eller Fjern egenskaper fra den **Egenskaper** rutenett.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, the PreFilterProperties method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For kolonner som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen metoden PreFilterProperties oppretter utformingen egenskapene til skyggen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: En samling implementering av <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>av egenskapene tillagt og skyggelagt.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should render its default action lists, which contain a data source ID drop-down list and related tasks.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal gjengi standard handlingslister, som inneholder en ID rullegardinlisten datakildelisten og relaterte oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: The default action lists for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class include a **Choose Data Source** menu item that has a drop-down list from which a data source can be selected, and any other action items on the action lists of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Standardhandlingen lister for de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>klassen inkluderer en **Velg datakilde** menyelementet som har en rullegardinliste som en datakilde kan velges, og andre handlingen elementer for handlingen listene kontrollens datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the data source control action lists will include **Configure Data Source** and **Refresh Schema** menu items, although these need not always be present.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis datakilde kontrollen handlingen lister inkluderer **konfigurere datakilden** og **Oppdater skjemaet** menyen elementer, selv om disse må ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item displays a dialog box that is appropriate to the type of data source chosen.
trans-unit.target: Den **konfigurere datakilden** menyelementet vises en dialogboks som passer for typen datakilde valgte.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, the **Configure Data Source** dialog box allows you to choose a business object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er for eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll av **konfigurere datakilden** dialogboksen kan du velge et business-objekt for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The **Refresh Schema** menu item refreshes the designer schema that is applied by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den **Oppdater skjemaet** menyelementet oppdaterer designer-skjemaet som brukes av datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
